duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct desk reviews and various on-site audits.
Research and determine billing and reimbursement compliance.
Plan, research, and conduct all phases of the audit including risk assessment, fieldwork, reporting of findings, and other procedures.
Review applicable Federal or State policies and regulations, and prepare working papers in accordance with government program regulations and AICPA standards.
Maintain thorough electronic documentation of audit scope and findings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Accounting
